QuestData.Title: The Seer's Relic
QuestData.Description: The stubborn close their mind and convince themselves of one truth. The wise keep an open mind to the different possibilities leading to and stemming from the present.$B$BTake this relic with you to where you found Sedai. See not with your eyes, $n, but with your mind.
QuestData.LogDescription: Amaan the Wise at the Temple of Telhamat in Hellfire Peninsula wants you to return to Sedai's Corpse, northeast of the Temple of Telhamat, and use the Seer's Relic at that location. Return to him after you've completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you seen the vision yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: I hope the vision you witnessed helped you gain some perspective on Sedai's death. The relic showed you a likely series of events leading up to the present. The truth may have been different, we'll never know for sure.$B$BWould you act differently knowing what you know now?$B$BWho can say whether our conflict with the orcs will continue? What's important is to remain open to the possibilities.
